text:
@JohnCornyn @DailyCaller Trump's supporters are White Supremacists, KKK members & so ignorant that they're willing to be exposed to #COVID19 to spew their hateful rhetoric to all who will listen! 
Trump is the most corrupt & incompetent man to EVER inhabit the WH & the @GOP is complicit in his crimes!! https://t.co/k3ynuZAwDa
